QuestData.Title: Regroup
QuestData.Description: These people may be able to hold out here, but I know for certain that we cannot.$b$bEvery moment we spend here places them in danger of Elisande's forces retaliating against us.$b$bWe need to move. We need to find a place to regroup and recover.$b$bFollow me. I think I know how we can get out of here.
QuestData.RewardText: Oculeth has anticipated our arrival. Good, one less thing to worry on.

Objectives.Objective: Teleport to the Top of the Terrace
